::Slayer::

Slayer exits the base, following behind Prebon and Spears. He was 
listening in on their conversation, and it sounded like Prebon valued 
Spears more than Slayer...

Slayer silently growled to himself. He would have to prove to Prebon 
that Spears was useless compared to himself.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She looked at Prebon and gave a half a smile. "I won't have to try. 
> But yes, I will do my best for you master."
